data.title: Child, Students & Educator Discounts
data.meta_description: The Colorado Symphony offers discounted tickets for children 12 and under, students, and educators with a valid ID.
data.text:
Students and educators can purchase $10* tickets to select+ concerts over the phone, in-person at the Box Office, or online at coloradosymphony.org using code LISTEN. Enter code LISTEN first, then select the Student/Teacher Discount price type when choosing your seat. A valid student or educator ID must be shown upon purchase or at ticket pick-up. All concerts are subject to availability and a limited number of discounted tickets are available per performance, so buy early!

Student Memberships give access to most performances at Boettcher Concert Hall all season long for a one-time fee. With two plans to choose from, you can select the one that works best for you – and your budget. All concerts are subject to availability and a limited number of Student Membership tickets are available per performance.

Harmony Student Membership

Cost: $99

This pass allows the member to receive one ticket to most* performances within a concert season (September – May), and to bring a fellow student at no additional charge. The guest must be a student and must present a valid student ID prior to receiving a ticket.

Children and families enjoy Colorado Symphony performances, especially our Holiday, Family, and Movie at the Symphony performances. All children require a ticket regardless of age, however tickets for children 12 and under to select+ concerts are only $10*. All concerts are subject to availability and a limited number of discounted tickets are available per performance, so buy early!
